div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Laboratory Codes

description.value: This Value Set is used for the standard laboratory codes. It also includes exceptional values.
